description: T(3,3n), where T(k,m) is the number of sequences a_1,...,a_m of integers 0,1,...,n with n=floor(m/k) such that the 'bumped' sequence b_1,...,b_m has exactly k of each of 0,...,n-1, where b_i=a_i + j (mod n+1) with minimal j>=0 such that b_0,...,b_i contain at most k elements equal to b_i.
